Rescuers continue to search for another child, and the body of a woman was found earlier.

Title: Russian church built in Sweden near strategic sites - Politico
Description: Russian church built in Sweden near strategic sites - PoliticoIn the Swedish city of Västerås, a Russian Orthodox Church was built near important strategic facilities, including an airport and a water treatment plant. The Swedish Security Police confirmed that the church was used for Russian intelligence activities.

Title: There are no Russian missile carriers in the Black and Azov Seas
Description: There are no Russian missile carriers in the Black and Azov SeasThere are no Russian warships in the Black and Azov Seas. There is one Kalibr cruise missile carrier ship in the Mediterranean with a volley of up to 8 missiles.

Title: Italian court again blocks deportation of migrants to Albania
Description: Italian court again blocks deportation of migrants to AlbaniaA court in Italy has ordered the return of seven migrants from a center in Albania, where they were sent under a bilateral agreement. The decision drew criticism from Deputy Prime Minister Matteo Salvini, who accused the judges of politicization.

Title: Ukrainian Armed Forces repel 5 Russian attacks on Novoivanivka in...
Description: Ukrainian Armed Forces repel 5 Russian attacks on Novoivanivka in Kursk region - DeepStateUkrainian troops repelled five attempts by Russian troops to seize the village of Novoivanivka in the Kursk region. 18 pieces of enemy equipment were destroyed, and enemy losses may reach 300 people.

Title: NYT: Trump may nominate Senator Rubio as US Secretary of State
Description: NYT: Trump may nominate Senator Rubio as US Secretary of StateNYT: Donald Trump is preparing to nominate Senator Marco Rubio for the post of US Secretary of State. Rubio, known for his hawkish stance on China and Iran, has recently been supporting Trump's policies.

Title: Haiti's main airport closed due to a surge in banditry
Description: Haiti's main airport closed due to a surge in banditryPort-au-Prince International Airport was closed after gunmen opened fire on a Spirit Airlines passenger plane. A flight attendant was injured in the attack, and the plane made an emergency landing in the Dominican Republic.

Title: Volyn border guards prevent export of an ancient icon from Ukrain...
Description: Volyn border guards prevent export of an ancient icon from Ukraine dating back to 1880At the Yahodyn checkpoint, border guards found a nineteenth-century icon in the belongings of a 37-year-old resident of Kharkiv region. The antique, dated 1880, was seized for examination.

Title: A drone attacked an oil depot in the Belgorod region of Russia
Description: A drone attacked an oil depot in the Belgorod region of RussiaA drone attacked an oil depot in the Starooskolsky urban district of the Belgorod region, causing an explosion. As a result of the attack, one of the tanks caught fire, and ten fire crews extinguished the fire.

Title: DPRK ratifies mutual defense treaty with Russia
Description: DPRK ratifies mutual defense treaty with RussiaNorth Korea has ratified a comprehensive strategic partnership agreement with Russia. The document provides for military assistance in the event of an attack on one of the parties.
